name: iso8583Inbound
title: ISO8583 Inbound Connector
help: Configure the ISO8583 inbound connector for handling financial transactions.

value.name: port
value.helpTip: Port number on which to listen for incoming messages.

value.name: packager
value.helpTip: XML definition for ISO8583 message packager.

value.name: coreThreads
value.helpTip: Number of core threads for handling incoming connections.

value.name: maxThreads
value.helpTip: Maximum number of threads for handling incoming connections.

value.name: keepAlive
value.helpTip: Time (in seconds) that threads beyond the core count remain idle before being terminated.

value.name: queueLength
value.helpTip: Length of the queue that holds tasks before they are executed.

value.name: sequential
value.helpTip: Whether messages should be processed sequentially.

value.name: isProxy
value.helpTip: Specify whether the inbound endpoint acts as a proxy.

value.name: responseField
value.helpTip: Field to use for the response message.

value.name: successfulResponseCodev87
value.helpTip: Response code for successful transactions in version 87.

value.name: failureResponseCodev87
value.helpTip: Response code for failed transactions in version 87.

value.name: successfulResponseCodev93
value.helpTip: Response code for successful transactions in version 93.

value.name: failureResponseCodev93
value.helpTip: Response code for failed transactions in version 93.

value.name: messageFunctionMTIIndex
value.helpTip: Index of the Message Type Indicator for identifying the message function.

value.name: requestMessageFunctionIdentifier
value.helpTip: Identifier for the request message function.

value.name: requestResponseMessageFunctionIdentifier
value.helpTip: Identifier for the response message function.
